info.title: Weather Underground
info.description: Get forecast and weather data with complete geolocation services, global coverage and more.

get.description: This example will return the geographic attributes of San Francisco CA.    Use {2 letter state code} /    {City Name}

200.description: Get forecast and weather data with complete geolocation services, global coverage and more.

get.description: This example will return the geographic attributes of Paris, France. Use {Full Country Name} / {City Name}

200.description: Get forecast and weather data with complete geolocation services, global coverage and more.

get.description: This example will return the geographic attributes associated with the IP address location of the user.

200.description: Get forecast and weather data with complete geolocation services, global coverage and more.

get.description: This example will return the geographic attributes of zip code 94107

200.description: Get forecast and weather data with complete geolocation services, global coverage and more.

get.description: This example will return the geographic attributes of San Francisco International Airport (Airport Code: SFO)

200.description: Get forecast and weather data with complete geolocation services, global coverage and more.

get.description: This example will return the the geographic attributes of Latitude 37.776289 N, Longitude 122.395234 W

200.description: Get forecast and weather data with complete geolocation services, global coverage and more.

get.description: This example will return the the current weather conditions at the Personal Weather Station (pws) KCATAHOE2

200.description: Get forecast and weather data with complete geolocation services, global coverage and more.

get.description: This example will return the current conditions in San Francisco, California

200.description: Get forecast and weather data with complete geolocation services, global coverage and more.

get.description: This example will return the Astronomy of San Francisco, California

200.description: Get forecast and weather data with complete geolocation services, global coverage and more.

get.description: This example will return the 3 Day Forecast Summary for San Francisco, California

200.description: Get forecast and weather data with complete geolocation services, global coverage and more.

get.description: This example will return Today's Average Highs/Lows and Record Highs/Lows for San Francisco, California.

200.description: Get forecast and weather data with complete geolocation services, global coverage and more.

get.description: This example will return Current Conditions and a 3 day simple Forecast for Paris France in French. See documentation page for full list of language code options.

200.description: Get forecast and weather data with complete geolocation services, global coverage and more.

get.description: This example will return Current Conditions and a 3 day simple Forecast for Alicante, Spain in Spanish. See documentation page for full list of language code options.

200.description: Get forecast and weather data with complete geolocation services, global coverage and more.

get.description: This example will return the 10 Day Forecast Summary for San Francisco, California

200.description: Get forecast and weather data with complete geolocation services, global coverage and more.

get.description: This example will return a detailed hourly forecast for the 'next' 36 hours in San Francisco, California

200.description: Get forecast and weather data with complete geolocation services, global coverage and more.

get.description: This example will return URL's for satellite (visual and IR) images for San Francisco, California

200.description: Get forecast and weather data with complete geolocation services, global coverage and more.

get.description: This example will return dynamic radar image around Salt Lake City, UT with a transparent background. See Docs for all the options for creating these images.

200.description: Get forecast and weather data with complete geolocation services, global coverage and more.

get.description: This example will return dynamic radar image around Salt Lake City, UT with a Base Map background. See Docs for all the options for creating these images.

200.description: Get forecast and weather data with complete geolocation services, global coverage and more.

get.description: This example will return active severe alerts for San Francisco, California.    This request only works in the USA, Canada and Europe.

200.description: Get forecast and weather data with complete geolocation services, global coverage and more.

get.description: This example will return 4 days of tides for San Francisco, California starting 'today'.    This request only works in the USA.

200.description: Get forecast and weather data with complete geolocation services, global coverage and more.

get.description: This example will return 4 days of tides for San Francisco, California following March 3 2012.    This request only works in the USA.

200.description: Get forecast and weather data with complete geolocation services, global coverage and more.

get.description: This example will return raw tide data for San Francisco, California on March 3 2016.    This request only works in the USA.

200.description: Get forecast and weather data with complete geolocation services, global coverage and more.

get.description: This example will return a detailed hourly forecast for the next 10 days in San Francisco, California

200.description: Get forecast and weather data with complete geolocation services, global coverage and more.

get.description: This example will return yesterday's weather in San Francisco, California.

200.description: Get forecast and weather data with complete geolocation services, global coverage and more.

get.description: This example will return a Historical roll up of weather data in San Francisco from Oct 5 to Oct 31. An example application: http://www.wunderground.com/travelplanner/index.asp

200.description: Get forecast and weather data with complete geolocation services, global coverage and more.

get.description: This example will return URL's to webcam images in San Francisco, California.    It will also return information about the webcam, including it's location in Lat,Long coordinates.

200.description: Get forecast and weather data with complete geolocation services, global coverage and more.

get.description: This example will return dynamic animated radar image around Salt Lake City, UT with a base map background. See Docs for all the options for creating these images.

200.description: Get forecast and weather data with complete geolocation services, global coverage and more.

get.description: This example will return dynamic animated radar image around Salt Lake City, UT with a transparent background. See Docs for all the options for creating these images.

200.description: Get forecast and weather data with complete geolocation services, global coverage and more.

get.description: This example will return historical data for San Francisco, California for the specified date.    If you search by zip or lat/long you will get nearest airport.

200.description: Get forecast and weather data with complete geolocation services, global coverage and more.

get.description: This example will return historical data for a Personal Weather Station for the specified date.    The feature only works with JSON.    XML will come out soon.

200.description: Get forecast and weather data with complete geolocation services, global coverage and more.

get.description: This example will return the geographical and current conditions for San Francisco, California

get.description: This example will return the geographical, current conditions and 3 day forecast summary for San Francisco, California
